front.title: Dynamic Trust Security Architecture for Distributed Service Mesh

abstract.t: This document proposes a Service Mesh Dynamic-Trust Architecture (SM- DTA) to address security risks in dynamic service-to-service communication within distributed service mesh environments. The architecture is applicable to scenarios such as elastic service scaling and cross-domain service invocation. SM-DTA enforces end-to- end security governance through service identity authentication, dynamic context-aware policy engines, and data sovereignty proxies.
